long_description: The Swiss Army Renegade watch features black-on-black styling and is made with precision Swiss quartz movement. Features an easy-to-read dial with bold markings on a black background and luminous hands, numbers and hour markers. Includes a second hand with luminous ball. Durably constructed with Arnitel polyurethane case and a stainless-steel back; waterproof Arnitel polyurethane strap is perforated for breathability. The Swiss Army Renegade watch is water-resistant to 165 feet (50 meters).
short_description: The Swiss Army Renegade watch features black-on-black styling and is made with precision Swiss quartz movement.
